findings.Description: Lambda functions should be configured with a dead-letter queue for failed invocations.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Lambda function is not configured with a dead-letter queue

findings.Description: KMS customer-managed keys should have automatic key rotation enabled.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: KMS key rotation is not enabled

findings.Description: Classic Load Balancers should have connection draining enabled.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Classic Load Balancer does not have connection draining enabled

findings.Description: Classic Load Balancers should have connection draining enabled.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Classic Load Balancer does not have connection draining enabled

findings.Description: KMS key policy grants decrypt and encrypt permissions to external AWS account, potential data exfiltration risk.
findings.Title: KMS key allows external account access
